Question: emotion3D CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
emotion3D

Product: emotion3D’s in-cabin analysis software

- Camera-based in-cabin analysis for driving safety and user experience
- State of the art computer vision and machine learning software
- Highly accurate algorithms for safety-critical use cases
- Cost-efficient with optimized algorithms for standard low-power embedded ECUs
- Highly flexible, works with various camera types and ECU architectures
- On the edge processing ensures data privacy, no in-cabin camera data stored or leaves the car
- Customization services for different hardware and vehicle environments
- Partnership with Luxoft for virtual validation possibilities showcased at CES 2024
- Offers various software products for camera-based analysis of vehicle interiors
- Will be showcased at CES 2024, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
Summary_cn:
情感3D
产品：emotion3D的车内分析软件

- 基于摄像头的车内分析，用于行车安全和用户体验
- 采用最先进的计算机视觉和机器学习软件
- 高精度算法，适用于安全关键的用例
- 成本效益高，针对标准低功耗嵌入式ECU进行了优化算法
- 高度灵活，可与多种摄像头类型和ECU架构配合使用
- 边缘处理确保数据隐私，无车内摄像头数据存储或离开汽车
- 提供不同硬件和车辆环境的定制服务
- 与Luxoft合作，展示在2024年的CES上的虚拟验证可能性
- 提供多种基于摄像头的车内分析软件产品
- 将在美国内华达州拉斯维加斯的2024年CES展会上展示
